document_data.caption: The holy symbol of Zann.
document_data.name: Zann
document_data.title:
The Learned
The Marvelous
document_data.mainbody:
'''Zann''' was the scholarly [[deity]] of learning and intelligence of [[Zakhara]]. He was one of the [[Zakharan pantheon|eight Great Gods]] of the [[Land of Fate]] and preached the value of studying and understanding, of seeking new and preserving old knowledge. Zann's symbol was a fountain's jet. Zann was portrayed as a man in city dress with all the paraphernalia of a scribe. Like other [[Zakharan]] gods he was above such concerns as [[alignment]], as knowledge and intelligence could be used to build a peaceful society or to subvert it.
Zann's priests kept the greatest universities and libraries of Zakhara.
